description: Rome's first permanent theater, located in the Campus Martius. The complex was completed under the second consulship of Pompeius Magnus in 55 B.C.

properties.description: Representative modern location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of  Via di Grotta Pinta

locations.description: Representative modern location based on OpenStreetMap.
locations.details: The modern Via di Grotta Pinta marks the curve of the cavea of the Theater of Pompey. The modern street, and its buildings, rest upon the theater's substructions that serve as foundations.

history.comment: Reimported full way geometry and updated provenance
